name: webpack
description: mkdir webpack-demo && cd webpack-demo tnpm init -y tnpm install --save lodash tnpm install -g npx npx webpack npx webpack src/index.js dist/bundle.js npx webpack npx webpack --config webpack.config.js npm run build tnpm install --save-dev style-loader css-loader npm run build npm install --save-dev file-loader npm install --save-dev webpack-dev-server npm start
